此事體大.definition: see 茲事體大|兹事体大[zi1 shi4 ti3 da4]

此伏彼起.definition: see 此起彼伏[ci3 qi3 bi3 fu2]

此地無銀三百兩.pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3
此地無銀三百兩.definition: lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide

此時此地.definition: here and now; as things stand

此消彼長.definition: (idiom) one declines while the other flourishes; one loses out when the other one gains (as in a trade-off or a zero-sum game)

此致.definition: (used at the end of a letter to introduce a polite salutation)

此致敬禮.definition: respectfully yours (at the end of a letter)

此言不虛.definition: see 此言非虛|此言非虚[ci3yan2-fei1xu1]

此話怎講.definition: How do you mean?; How could that be the case?; How so?

此起彼伏.definition: up here, down there (idiom); to rise and fall in succession; no sooner one subsides, the next arises; repeating continuously; occurring again and again (of applause, fires, waves, protests, conflicts, uprisings etc)

此起彼落.definition: to rise and fall in succession (idiom); repeating continuously

此路不通.definition: this road is blocked; fig. This method does not work.; Doing this is no good.

此道.definition: such matters; things like this; this line of work; this pursuit; this hobby; this endeavor
